metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18222 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The ECDSA signature implementation in ecdsa.c in Arm Mbed Crypto 2.1 and Mbed TLS through 2.19.1 does not reduce the blinded scalar before computing the inverse, which allows a local attacker to recover the private key via side-channel attacks.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.4-1ubuntu2').
